New Records: The Raptors set a new franchise record with a 30-point loss in their home opener
Key Match Events: The Cavaliers dominated from the second quarter onward, leading to a 136-106 victory
Pre-Game Insights: The Raptors were highlighted as a young roster entering the season
Post-Match Reflections: Chris Boucher expressed frustration but optimism for the future
Evan Mobley contributed significantly to the Cavaliers' win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game occurred on the Raptors' 30th anniversary season
